uk.ac.cf.cs.scm5mjw.mda.devices
Class CommunicationEvent

java.lang.Object
  uk.ac.cf.cs.scm5mjw.mda.devices.CommunicationEvent

public class CommunicationEvent
extends java.lang.Object

This event indicates a communication event (e.g. transfer of an artifact) has occurred in the Simulation.

Constructor Detail

CommunicationEvent

public CommunicationEvent(AbstractWirelessDevice device1,
                          java.util.List<Artifact> toDevice1,
                          AbstractWirelessDevice device2,
                          java.util.List<Artifact> toDevice2)
Constructs a CommunicationEvent object with the various items of data that describe the event.

Parameters:
device1 - one of the two devices involved in the communication event
device2 - one of the two devices involved in the communication event
toDevice1 - the artifacts that were to be committed to device1
toDevice2 - the artifacts that were to be committed to device2
Method Detail

getDevice1

public AbstractWirelessDevice getDevice1()
An accessor to return one of the devices involved in the communication event.

getDevice2

public AbstractWirelessDevice getDevice2()
An accessor to return one of the devices involved in the communication event.

getArtifactsToDevice1

public java.util.List<Artifact> getArtifactsToDevice1()
An accessor to return the list of artifacts that were to be committed to device1 (i.e. these are the artifacts that will be added to device1 if the communication and transmission are successful).

getArtifactsToDevice2

public java.util.List<Artifact> getArtifactsToDevice2()
An accessor to return the list of artifacts that were to be committed to device2 (i.e. these are the artifacts that will be added to device2 if the communication and transmission are successful).
